info.p: XML format used by the TIGER project (Mengel and Lezius, 2000). A variant of that format, enriched for the purpose of semantic role annotation, is called Salsa/Tiger (Erk and Padó, 2004). See also Tiger2.

ul.li: Andreas Mengel and Wolfgang Lezius. 2000. An XML-based Representation Format for Syntactically Annotated Corpora. In Proceedings of the Second International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation (LREC’00), Athens, Greece. European Language Resources Association (ELRA).

Katrin Erk and Sebastian Padó. 2004. A Powerful and Versatile XML Format for Representing Role-semantic Annotation. In Proceedings of the Fourth International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation (LREC’04), Lisbon, Portugal. European Language Resources Association (ELRA).
